description: Hoax numbers: composite numbers whose digit-sum equals the sum of the digit-sums of its distinct prime factors.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Hoax Number
prog: (Haskell)a019506 n = a019506_list !! (n-1)a019506_list = [x | x <- a002808_list,                    a007953 x == sum (map a007953 (a027748_row x))]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 19 2011
author: Mario Velucchi (mathchess(AT)velucchi.it)
